generate diorite stone
host
harvestLevel 1
hardness 2.5
texture strata:blocks/stone/very_strong/diorite
convertsTo minecraft:stone 3

generate diorite cobble
harvestLevel 1
hardness 3.0
texture strata:overlays/cobble normal 100 strata:blocks/stone/very_strong/diorite

generate diorite cobblemossy
harvestLevel 1
hardness 3.0
texture strata:overlays/mossy_cobble normal 100 strata:overlays/cobble normal 100 strata:blocks/stone/very_strong/diorite

generate diorite stonebrick
harvestLevel 1
hardness 2.5
texture strata:overlays/brick_highlight lighten 36 strata:overlays/brick_shadow darken 41 strata:blocks/stone/very_strong/diorite

generate diorite stonebrickmossy
harvestLevel 1

texture strata:overlays/mossy_stonebrick normal 100 strata:overlays/brick_highlight lighten 36 strata:overlays/brick_shadow darken 41 strata:blocks/stone/very_strong/diorite
